app.title: Photoroom AI Photo Editor
app.description:
Create Stunning Images in Seconds with Photoroom AI.

Photoroom‚Äôs AI technology makes it easy to design, edit, and remove backgrounds from your photos. Create professional-quality images that elevate your brand, boost engagement, and drive sales.

Why Choose Photoroom?

üåü AI-Powered Design
No design experience needed! Simply describe your idea, and Photoroom AI quickly creates your logo, custom stickers, scenes, and more. Save time while the AI creates professional designs for you in seconds.

üñºÔ∏è One-Tap Background Removal and Replacement
Enhance your product photos effortlessly with AI backgrounds. Create polished product shots, eye-catching posts, or ad-ready images.

üñåÔ∏è Create your Brand Kit
Keep your logos, colors, and fonts all in one place for consistent look every time.

üîÑ Boost Productivity with Batch Editing
Edit multiple images at once, perfect for e-commerce sellers or content creators. Save time while maintaining high-quality images.

‚ú® Resizing Tools
Ensure your images are optimized for Instagram, Facebook, YouTube, Amazon, Shopify and more‚Äîwithout cropping or pixelation.

üé® Customizable Templates for Every Occasion
Choose from a variety of AI-powered templates for holidays, promotions, and events. Customize templates quickly to match your needs, saving time on design and creating standout content.

üí° Perfect Your Photos with AI Photo Editor
Photoroom‚Äôs AI photo editor helps you remove unwanted objects, clean up images, and improve photos with ease. Adjust lighting, shadows, and sharpness for professional-level results.

ü§ù Collaborate Easily
Invite team members to Photoroom to collaborate on designs in real-time. Photoroom‚Äôs AI-powered tools make sharing, commenting, and editing seamless, ensuring consistent branding and efficient teamwork.

üì± Quick Export and Easy Sharing
Export your creations and share them directly to social media or download them for marketing campaigns, product listings, or personal projects‚Äîall hassle-free.

Who Is Photoroom For?
- E-commerce Sellers: Generate your logo and create product listings with AI-powered background removal and editing. Edit multiple photos with batch editing functionality.
- Content Creators: Design standout images to grow your brand. Access pre-made templates for easy customization.
- Social Media Managers: Produce engaging social media posts across platforms. Resize images for Instagram, YouTube and more‚Äîno cropping needed.
- Freelancers: Deliver professional designs to clients on time. Invite members to comment, edit, then share designs.
- Everyone: Whether a logo, product photo, sticker, or social media image, Photoroom‚Äôs AI tools have you covered.


Why Millions Love Photoroom
‚≠ê Easy to Use: With Photoroom‚Äôs intuitive AI tools, anyone can create professional visuals‚Äîno design skills required.
‚≠ê Pro-Level Results: Achieve high-quality results effortlessly, thanks to Photoroom‚Äôs AI photo editor.

Try Photoroom Pro ‚Äì Free with Our Trial
Unlock advanced AI tools, premium templates, and unlimited exports with Photoroom Pro‚Äôs free trial. You‚Äôll only be charged after the trial ends unless canceled.

Whether you‚Äôre growing your online store, building your social media presence, or designing content, Photoroom‚Äôs AI-powered tools make it easy to create stunning visuals. Join over 200 million users today and experience AI photo editing!

app.summary: Design with AI: Create logos, remove backgrounds, edit photos, retouch images.

reviews.text: Great app. DO NOT THINK IT'S FREE!! IT IS NOT!!! the ads say it's free, it is not. what the ads don't say is that you get a 7 day free trial and then it's $90 a year if you want to keep it. So far though, I like it. I've been messing with a few pictures in my gallery and they all look good. We will see what the new year brings as to whether or not I keep the app.
reviews.replyText: Thanks for the feedback! We're glad to hear you're enjoying the app so far. To clarify, we offer a 7-day free trial so users can explore all premium features before committing. After that, it switches to a paid plan unless canceled during the trial. We appreciate your support!

reviews.text: The AI object select and background generator are on a completely different level. What used to take me hours to do in Photoshop takes seconds here! No other photo editing app even comes close. The AI on this app actually examines your product and creates an atmosphere that matches lighting, orientation, size, position, camera angle. It doesn't just throw your product on a background. It builds an intelligent background. If you're editing product photos, this is the only app to use. It's crazy!

This really pissed me off. There's so many functions and options to utilize to make some neat photos, but most EVERYTHING is locked for pro. I kept going round and round trying to erase parts of a photo and put some back in it, and it kept messing up, erasing most of the person and having to start all over! Maddening. Plus, like I said, VERY few ways to make a fun photo. Everything locked up. Pfft. Not cool. I test a TON of photo editing apps and it's too bad greed got in the way of a good app.

This is an amazing app. It is one of the best photo editing apps ever!! This photo editing app "Photoroom" has everything! Removing of background for you and it removes the background to perfection! No ragged edges or nothing! It also has a wide selection of unique backgrounds. You can also do AI art and so much more. It's very affordable after the one week free trial. I will be using this app forever! Who needs Photoshop when you have this all!?!?!! 5 ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ês!

Best app if you want to remove a background instantly. Does the solid black and white backgrounds too and with one push of a button. Any color!!! It also integrates with Google photos! So, when you are looking at your pics and click 'edit' a menu now comes up asking if you want to edit with Photoroom or whatever. it's so easy too. Don't have to learn a thing. Thankful for this app!

Worked great for two years, and I am paying for a pro plan. Unfortunately in the past few days when I try to edit a template or add a photo, I received an error that simply says "an error occured". Will look for an alternative app and will cancel my subscription if they can't fix the issues. It's basically useless now. Edit: the app is still buggy, and none of my templates work. I'm cancelling my membership and looking elsewhere. They introduced AI and it ruined a good app.
reviews.replyText: Hello! Thank you for your feedback, and sorry for the inconvenience. Could you contact the support team directly inside the PhotoRoom app? (you just have to click on the Help icon in the top bar). It will help us investigate and fix the issue (feel free to ask to talk to an Android developer directly). Thank you in advance! üôè

reviews.text: The background remover function is excellent. But so are other apps for a better price. Bummed that recent updates did away with all of the color and preset backgrounds, leaving only the AI-generated options. They are good sometimes but lately have been mostly disappointing. The photo editor is not good enough to be listed as a feature. Now I'm debating whether or not it's worth what I pay and I'm again in the market for an app that does what yours used to. Bummer.

This used to be an AMAZING app for posting professional looking product photos for free. Now they have taken away all the great aspects of the free part (like having some backgrounds for free and others for purchase to now having zero backgrounds for free). I was going to pay for the app because I used many of the features before, but charging $4.99 per WEEK is beyond ridiculous. I used to have a paid membership and it absolutely was not that expensive. Uninstalling because now what's the point?

I love the app once I figured out how to download to my photos. The only reason I am giving it a four is it would be nice instead of getting an error & wasting time searching how to fix it, or just stop downloading it would give me an idea of the problem. Like "you have exceeded your monthly free downloads, to see your monthly list go to"... before you begin it tells you to update. Other than that it's the most affordable and user friendly one out their. Hope it remains that way.

One Major Flaw. I've been using the free version for a couple of years on 2 different platforms. I mainly only use the background remove/replace feature for online listing photos. It functions very well in that regard. What I absolutely hate is that the crispness and clarity of my photos are instantly downgraded after the process. It's especially noticeable in the dark areas - similar to lower-quality TV displays. Would this be improved in the paid version of the app? I'm not willing to find out

app.recentChanges: This update brings new features and stability improvements to make your Photoroom experience even greater.
app.AIReview:
Photoroom AI Photo Editor Review ‚Äì A Powerful Tool With Room to Grow

Overview

Photoroom AI Photo Editor, boasting over 142 million installs and a robust 4.69 rating, presents itself as a straightforward solution for anyone seeking professional-looking images without extensive design experience. The app‚Äôs core promise‚Äîcreating stunning visuals in seconds using AI‚Äîis compelling, targeting both individual users looking to elevate their social media presence and small businesses needing marketing materials. The free tier provides substantial functionality, immediately attracting a wide audience, while the underlying subscription model offers access to more advanced features. However, despite its popularity and impressive install count, Photoroom isn't without limitations that potential users should carefully consider.

Key Features

Photoroom‚Äôs feature set is built around AI-powered design and image manipulation. The core functionalities can be categorized as follows:

  • AI Design Generation: This is the app‚Äôs headline feature. Users input a text description (e.g., ‚Äúmodern logo for a coffee shop,‚Äù "tropical beach scene") and Photoroom‚Äôs AI generates corresponding visuals, including logos, custom stickers, scenes, and even short video templates. The quality of these generated assets varies considerably depending on the prompt's clarity and specificity.
  • Background Removal: A robust background removal tool utilizes AI to seamlessly remove backgrounds from photos with remarkable accuracy‚Äîsignificantly faster than traditional methods. It offers adjustable brush controls for refining the selection and ensuring a clean cut.
  • Photo Editing & Retouching: Standard photo editing capabilities are included, encompassing adjustments to brightness, contrast, saturation, sharpness, and color temperature. There's also a basic retouching suite allowing users to smooth skin, reduce blemishes, and adjust eye color.
  • Sticker Creation: Users can create their own custom stickers by uploading images or using the AI generator directly within this function. These stickers are easily integrated into photos and videos.
  • Video Templates: The app provides a selection of pre-designed video templates for social media marketing, further broadening its appeal to businesses.

Strengths

  • Ease of Use: Photoroom‚Äôs greatest strength is undoubtedly its intuitive interface. The AI design feature specifically caters to users lacking formal design skills. The drag-and-drop functionality and simple prompts make it accessible even to beginners.
  • Speed & Efficiency: The AI-powered features, particularly background removal and the initial design generation, drastically reduce editing time. Creating a complex scene with the AI can be accomplished in under 30 seconds ‚Äì a significant advantage over manual methods.
  • High Volume of Generated Content: With 142 million installs, Photoroom has clearly hit on a popular need. The sheer volume of content generated by the AI demonstrates its capabilities and provides a substantial library for users to draw from.
  • Free Tier Value: The free version offers a surprising amount of functionality, enabling users to experiment with the core features before committing to a subscription.

Areas for Improvement

  • AI Consistency & Quality: While impressive, the quality of AI-generated designs is inconsistent. Complex prompts often yield underwhelming results requiring multiple iterations and refinements. The AI occasionally struggles with detail accuracy and realistic rendering.
  • Limited Customization (Free Tier): The free version restricts access to many advanced editing tools and premium AI features, forcing users to upgrade for full functionality. This can be a barrier for casual users who might find the core features sufficient.
  • Prompt Sensitivity: The success of the AI design feature heavily relies on prompt clarity. Vague prompts result in generic outputs. Users need to learn how to craft effective prompts‚Äîa learning curve that isn‚Äôt immediately apparent.
  • Watermark (Free Tier): The free version applies a watermark to exported images and videos, limiting their use for commercial purposes.

User Experience

The user experience within Photoroom is generally smooth and responsive. The interface is clean and uncluttered, making it easy to navigate between features. The AI design generation process is particularly well-executed; the app provides visual feedback as the AI works, keeping the user engaged. However, the app can occasionally feel sluggish when processing complex edits or generating large numbers of designs ‚Äì a potential performance bottleneck that needs addressing. The onboarding tutorial is adequate but could benefit from more detailed guidance on crafting effective prompts for the AI design feature.

Value for Money

Photoroom's subscription pricing reflects its functionality. The premium tiers unlock advanced editing tools, higher-resolution exports, and access to all AI features. Considering the time saved by using the AI-powered tools ‚Äì particularly background removal ‚Äì a subscription can represent excellent value for professionals or businesses needing a consistent stream of high-quality visuals. However, the free tier‚Äôs limitations may not be sufficient for users requiring extensive editing capabilities. The price point needs to be carefully weighed against the quality and consistency of the AI output.

Conclusion

Photoroom AI Photo Editor is a powerful tool that democratizes image creation by leveraging AI technology. Its intuitive interface and impressive speed make it accessible to both novice and experienced users. Despite some inconsistencies in its AI performance and limitations within the free tier, Photoroom‚Äôs popularity ‚Äì driven by its ease of use and rapid design capabilities ‚Äì isn't unwarranted. The app is a solid choice for individuals seeking quick and easy image editing solutions or small businesses needing marketing materials, but prospective users should be aware of its reliance on AI output quality and carefully consider the subscription costs to determine if it aligns with their specific needs and budget. Continued development focusing on improving AI consistency and expanding customization options within the free tier would significantly enhance Photoroom‚Äôs overall value proposition.
